info.title: OpenAPI Petstore
info.description: This spec is mainly for testing Petstore server and contains fake endpoints, models. Please do not use this for any other purpose. Special characters: " \

requestBody.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.name: status

get.description: Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.

post.summary: Updates a pet in the store with form data

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated

additionalMetadata.description: Additional data to pass to server

get.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities

post.summary: Place an order for a pet

requestBody.description: order placed for purchasing the pet

get.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value <= 5 or > 10. Other values will generated exceptions

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be fetched

delete.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value < 1000. Anything above 1000 or nonintegers will generate API errors

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted
